i make my own compost.

content.text: I'm doing good! Just got done eating some McDonald's french fries. They're my favorite, but I hide that from my parents.
I'm trying to eat healthier, but my boyfriend loves fast food. I'm trying to get him to eat healthier with me.
It's hard to change someone's eating habits, but I'm sure you can do it!
What do you do for a living?
I'm a dentist because I love helping people, but my heart belongs to my parents and sweets!
That's great! I'm an artist and my family is really supportive of my work. They're always there for me.
That's awesome! I'm glad you have such a supportive family.
I woke up in a different hotel this morning, and I'm spending my day exploring a new place.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm glad you're getting to experience new things.
I dream of playing music for a living
